entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
